entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023
